荊.definition: chaste tree or berry (Vitex agnus-castus); alternative name for the Zhou Dynasty state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]

荊山.definition: Thorny mountain (several); Mt Jingshan in Hubei

荊州.definition: see 荊州市|荆州市[Jing1zhou1 Shi4]

荊州區.definition: Jingzhou district of Jingzhou city 荊州市|荆州市[Jing1 zhou1 shi4], Hubei

荊州市.definition: Jingzhou, prefecture-level city in Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2bei3 Sheng3]

荊棘.definition: thistles and thorns; brambles; thorny undergrowth

荊棘載途.definition: lit. a path covered in brambles; a course of action beset by difficulties (idiom)

荊榛滿目.definition: thorns and brambles as far as eye can see (idiom); beset by troubles

荊江.definition: Jingjiang section of the Changjiang River 長江|长江, Hunan

荊芥.definition: schizonepeta, herb used in Chinese medicine

荊軻.definition: Jing Ke (-227 BC), celebrated in verse and fiction as would-be assassin of King Ying Zheng of Qin 秦嬴政 (later the First Emperor 秦始皇)

荊門.definition: see 荊門市|荆门市[Jing1men2 Shi4]

荊門市.definition: Jingmen, prefecture-level city in Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2bei3 Sheng3]
